# Benchmark for Derk's Gym

## Results

#### MSI Laptop
gym_derk=0.8.12 Renderer=ANGLE (NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 Direct3D11 vs_5_0 ps_5_0) Vendor=Google Inc.

1 | 13.788016557693481 | 0.3312889814376831 | 6.795670473575592
